resources.string: The bar shows your experience progress toward your next level.
You earn experience idly while your character is fighting.
Experience earned is based on your stats.

effects how long your character will fight for. Your character will go through one health every minute. You start with 60 health and every Life Point you put in gives you 5 more health. You can put in a maximum of 100 life points into the health stat.
Completing your tasks on your calendar will heal your character to keep them fighting longer.
When your health runs out, your character will meditate to start healing themselves. You may also manually switch them to meditate. While meditating, your character will start to recover health.
Streaks are goals that you set for yourself.
Completing streaks will get you extra experience and coins.
Weekly streaks are based on your daily reminders. Completing them throughout the week adds to your streak.
Monthly streaks are based on tasks that happen less often such as every few days or once a week.
Times reminder happens in a day: %1$d
Badges are earned by completing different milestones. They can also be though of as achievements.
By starting your journey in building better habits, you have earned the badge "Everyone Starts at the Beginning" by creating your account.
Badges that are colored and brighter have a picture are the ones you have earned. If they are greyed out with a question mark, they are for you to reach for.
Clicking on a badge will tell you what it is for.
